By who/how will judging be done?

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Paul Hightower [mailto:dph_of_rules@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 10, 2003 12:08 PM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] the official theme


It's official: the first theme for the monthly scenario contest is 
"The Fall of Troy".

Here;s the list of people that I know are entering the contest:

Telvido, Zardus, Doomlordx, and myself

If I missed anybody, let me know.  I need to know by May 18 who all is 
participating.
